Description: Egypt, full-length portrait of Nubian adult female and male child. Female wearing trousers, gown, veil with metal nose cylinder, wrist-ornaments. Carrying basket of vegetables on head. Male wearing gown, shaved head, scarification on cheek. Carrying metal box over shoulder. Backdrop painted with trees. Albumen print. Format: Print mounted on card, second print on other side of card.
Curator's comments: Type of veil known as "burku". J M Hudson, 1/12/1997. Geography: Ethnic group suggested by S A Mackie, 12/12/1997. Biography: Relationship of McCarthy to image is unclear.
Condition: Print mounted on disintegrating card. Section missing from bottom edge.
